definitions.text: a dead body that has been brought back to life by a supernatural force
(voodooism) a spirit or supernatural force that reanimates a dead body
a god of voodoo cults of African origin worshipped especially in West Indies
someone who acts or responds in a mechanical or apathetic way
examples: only an automaton wouldn't have noticed

definitions.text: several kinds of rum with fruit juice and usually apricot liqueur
